modName: The Wise Wolf Holo - a Spice and Wolf follower
summary: A standalone follower made by a newbie modder.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]4m2DpMYIXDM[/youtube]

It's a standalone follwer, but u'll need to have HDT Physics due to I put a HDT tail on her. also a XPMSE skeleton would keep her tail work correctly(if you dont have a XPMSE newest skeleton, tail would probly float in air when u sneak, sit, mount or jump.)

Holo will be at Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood, drinking and waiting someone take her on the journey.



She looks a liitle diffirent with picture if u look closly, those solo pictures were took with my playable character not the follower I made.

so this would be a beta version, hope I could solve the problem of face different.

English is not my native, but ill try to give an answer if you ask.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
thanks a lot for ZReincarnation, without him this follower will never be created.

and useful standalone follower tutorials from 3DM.

this follower is created using :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]
Creation Kit
NifSkope
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14205]Calyps Animal Ears[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61178]Adorable Face
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58165]HDT Tails Wearable[/url]

character was created by Hasekura Isuna
I made this follow refer to character design by kawakami rokkaku 

author : rm8rockman
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Need some help to improve this follower:

I couldn't keep her face look exactly like what I create in ECE, head becomes too small, neck length becomes too long, and I solve this problem by changing lip type to liptype33, but my character's face actually being changed a little, and I couldn't find any tutorial or any way to fix it.

My original character looks like:
[youtube]p_dT7pjruW4[/youtube]


hope someone good at it could give me some advise and help, by far this is the best I can do alone.
author: rm8rockman
